sinopsis: A group of vigilantes sets out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

episodios.titulo: T1:E1 - The Name of the Game
episodios.sinopsis: When a superhero carelessly kills his girlfriend, Hughie Campbell joins Billy Butcher's clandestine group to expose the truth and seek justice.
Butcher visits an old friend to get information about a superhero. Hughie infiltrates Vought.
The Boys try to capture Translucent, while Hughie struggles with the consequences of his actions.

episodios.titulo: T1:E4 - The Female of the Species
episodios.sinopsis: The team discovers a mysterious woman with lethal abilities and decides to help her.
Starlight begins to question The Seven's methods while participating in a Christian convention.
Butcher and Hughie investigate Compound V's past, uncovering dark secrets.
The Boys face devastating consequences as they get closer to the truth about Vought.
The final showdown between The Boys and Homelander reveals shocking truths.
The Boys are on the run and must adapt to their new situation while Vought introduces Stormfront.

episodios.synopsis: Butcher returns with the team, but tensions rise. Homelander spends time with his new 'son'.

episodios.titulo: T2:E3 - Over the Hill with the Swords of a Thousand Men
episodios.sinopsis: A mission to capture a supervillain gets complicated, revealing more about Stormfront.

episodios.titulo: T2:E4 - Nothing Like It in the World
episodios.sinopsis: Butcher searches for his wife while Hughie and Starlight investigate Liberty's past.
The Boys infiltrate a Vought movie to get crucial information.
The team discovers a secret hospital where Vought experiments with Compound V.
Butcher's backstory is revealed as the team faces new threats.
In the season's climax, The Boys confront Stormfront and Homelander in a decisive battle.
The Boys try to adapt to a new status quo while investigating Soldier Boy.

episodios.titulo: T3:E2 - The Only Man in the Sky
episodios.sinopsis: Homelander celebrates his birthday while tensions rise within Vought.
The investigation into Soldier Boy leads the team to discover secrets from the past.
Butcher takes extreme measures to level the playing field against the Supes.

episodios.titulo: T3:E5 - The Last Time to Look on This World of Lies
episodios.sinopsis: The Boys face obstacles while Homelander consolidates his power in Vought.
A secret superhero party reveals shocking truths and leads to an epic confrontation.

episodios.titulo: T3:E7 - Here Comes a Candle to Light You to Bed
episodios.synopsis: Loyalties are tested as the team prepares for the final confrontation.

episodios.sinopsis: The culminating confrontation between The Boys and Homelander changes the course of their lives.
Homelander faces his trial while The Boys plan their next move.
The team infiltrates a suspicious community while discovering new secrets.

episodios.titulo: T4:E3 - We'll Keep the Red Flag Flying Here
episodios.sinopsis: Annie discovers the reason for Firecracker's hatred towards her. Hughie escapes death with unexpected help.
Homelander visits the place where he grew up, reliving dark memories.

episodios.titulo: T4:E5 - Beware the Jabberwock, My Son
episodios.sinopsis: While Hughie cares for his dying father, The Boys free Stan to obtain an anti-Supe virus.
Vought's secrets come to light as the team faces new threats.
An internal betrayal jeopardizes The Boys' mission.

episodios.synopsis: The season's climax leads to irreversible consequences for all involved.
